data.title: Get Extra Cheesy this Valentine's Day with Pizza 73
data.meta_description: Eat your heart out this Valentine's Day with Pizza 73. Western Canada's leading pizza chain is bringing back its Valentine's Delight Pizza, a medium two topping pizza in the shape of a heart with a free ...
data.text:
EDMONTON, ALBERTA--(Marketwired - Feb 9, 2015) - Eat your heart out this Valentine's Day with Pizza 73. Western Canada's leading pizza chain is bringing back its Valentine's Delight Pizza, a medium two topping pizza in the shape of a heart with a free 2 for 1 Cineplex movie admission, for only $11.99.

"Our Valentine's Delight Pizza and movie deal is perfect for a date night or to enjoy with anyone special in your life," said Pat Finelli, Chief Marketing Officer for Pizza 73. "Love is in the air and can be celebrated by anyone on Valentine's Day, so this is a cute and inexpensive way to show love to a friend, family member or your significant other."

DID YOU KNOW?

Last year, Valentine's Day was among the top three busiest days of the year for Pizza 73.

The Valentine's Delight Pizza was first introduced in 2013 and is available at Pizza 73 locations all week long. For more information on Pizza 73's menu items, visit www.Pizza73.com.

About Pizza 73
